long_description: Available in Black, Desert and Camo colors, the Petzl Tactikka Plus Headlamp stays discreet while you're hunting, fishing and hiking. The consistent beam with boost mode lights up dark trails. Quality white LED outputs 100 lumens on high, 45 lumens on medium and 30 lumens on low; switch to boost mode for temporary access to 125 lumens to light up the darkest trails. Red LED positioned to the side of the white LED helps preserve your night vision. Use the red and white strobes to signal for help in the mountains or increase your visibility in urban settings. 3 AAA alkaline batteries (included) provide up to 2 hrs. of use on high, 6 hrs. on medium and 12 hrs on low; compatible with rechargeable NiMH and lithium batteries. Constant Lighting technology ensures that the brightness doesn't decrease gradually as the batteries drain. When the batteries are almost drained, the headlamp automatically switches to reserve mode, which provides a minimum of 8 lumens for up to 50 hrs. Red lighting switches on when the batteries are practically empty to preserve a minimal amount of lighting. Push-button switch is easy to use, even with gloves on. Headband adjust easily to fit comfortably around your head; headband is washable. Petzl Tactikka Plus Headlamp battery case opens easily for changing the batteries. Provides IPX4 water resistance for protection against sprayed water.
short_description: Available in Black, Desert and Camo colors, the Petzl Tactikka Plus Headlamp stays discreet while you're hunting, fishing and hiking. The consistent beam with boost mode lights up dark trails.
